E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/8/1976
Subject: Progress of Shane Rawley
Dear Sir,
Shane Rawley has nothing more to prove at AA Columbus Astros!
He has an ERA of 2.78 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 9/14/1976
Subject: Good Game
Hello,
The fact that we won on a promotion day seems
to have a positive effect on our fan interest!
It increased slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director
